file_content.text: Ouch! Give it a rest, will you?
I'm getting my fill of fun while I still can, slave.
Ah, as if on cue, look who's back. Word is you might become Lord Baras's apprentice. Hrmph. Nice work, if you can get it.
Baras supposedly sent me an acolyte named Klemral, some whiny little castoff, but the deadbeat hasn't shown up. You know anything about him?
Hrmph. Consider that a going away present, Twi'lek. Seems you might be useful for something after all--this bruiser is taking you into the tomb where we caught you.
You going to take that, jailer? Give her another zap.
Shut her up, Knash.
Was just about to.
No shockable offenses here, master. I'm just minding my business, following you wherever you go, like a good obedient slave should.
What's that whirring sound? I've got a bad feeling about this.
No shockable offenses here, master. I'm just minding my business, following you wherever you go, like a good obedient slave should.
Gee, I snuck past all these beasties before--but I suppose a blunt instrument like you wouldn't be capable of subtlety like that.
Yup, this is the right tomb, all right. I recognize the nasty smell.
Well, I guess we're safe for the moment.
No offense, but don't bother me, okay? I'm trying to retrace the steps in my mind so I can find the secret chamber for you.
I'm not Klemral's keeper.
Why would I?
Hrmph. No, I suppose not.
Klemral means well and he tries hard.
He's a good man.
He ought to try hard to be on time.
Klemral is a coward. You're better off without him.
Nothing good.
Great. I always get the prizes.
So, I hear you'll be relieving me of this Twi'lek. She's a pain in the neck.
Ha! Who's a pain in the neck? I'm the one wearing the shock collar.
You won't be laughing very long, slave.
Enough jokes.
It's not how long you laugh that counts--it's how hard.
I take it the jailer uses it liberally.
Getting shocked a lot?
Yeah, he's got a hyperactive trigger finger.
Yow! All right, this is getting old!
None of you can figure out how to activate the tomb statues to open the forbidden cavern, huh?
You got some kind of business in that secret Sith chamber, do you?
Don't ask questions.
Yes, and I'd appreciate your help.
That's correct.
Don't bother being pleasant.
Jailer, I think she needs a little more juice.
You just earned another shock.
All right, one more for the road.
Agh! Enough!
Here, kid, take this shock control collar. I'll set it to a higher level. Use it enough, she'll show you the back door to her mother's house.
She'll cooperate or suffer endlessly.
A perfect tool.
I can take a hint. Something tells me I shouldn't mess with you.
I sincerely hope it won't be necessary.
I'll save it as a last resort.
Wait, somebody pinch me--you mean there's a Sith who isn't completely horrible?
I suppose I can play tomb tour guide. A lot of work went into cracking that nut, but I did it once, I can do it again.
So we're clear, I'm officially on strike when it comes to domestic duties.
You'll do everything I require--and I mean everything.
Obey my every command.
Don't get any twisted ideas in that Sithy head of yours.
I promise you, I won't require a maid.
Don't be silly.
Well then, maybe things are looking up for me. As if they could get worse.
Lead the way. I'll show you the unlocking points throughout the tomb and then open the secret door for you.
Let's give this higher setting a test run.
No, you aren't. [Shock Vette]
Argh! Okay, that's worse! Stop!
Okay, let's try the higher setting.
Test run. [Shock Vette]
Argh! Okay, that's worse! Stop!
If I'd known all that work and research would land me here, I'd have stayed home. But I'll play tomb tour guide to your heart's content.
Just please, ease up on the shock collar. You might scramble my brain and make me forget where everything is.
You will call me master, slave.
Show respect.
Yes, all right, I'll be good. Master.
All right, I'll give the shock collar a rest.
I'll desist, for now.
Thank you.
Let's find out how many you can take.
Not yet. [Shock Vette]
Yeargh! Okay, okay, please, no more. I don't want to die. I'll cooperate.
I'll take you to the unlocking points throughout the tomb and then open the secret door for you. Just lead the way.
Can't you find some slave to bother?
Uh, no bad behavior here. You can just move on.
